snippet: For a long three months, Michigan sorely missed Jon Merrill - the 6-foot-3, second-round Devils draft pick - who served a then-indefinite suspension handed down before the season for an unspecified violation of team rules.
abstract: For a long three months, Michigan sorely missed Jon Merrill - the 6-foot-3, second-round Devils draft pick - who served a then-indefinite suspension handed down before the season for an unspecified violation of team rules.

headline.main: Michigan's Rebound Ignited by a Defenseman
